channel.title: Tops on Full 90 Analytica
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Full 90 Analytica

item.description: Simon Fisher is a data analyst with a passion for applying mathematical and econometric analysis to football. He has experience working with multiple MLS clubs (Orlando City F.C., Nashville S.C.), as well a consulting with USMNT. Projects [Team Shape Analysis] [Offensive Repossession Ids]

Resources Books Soccermatics: Mathematical Adventures in the Beautiful Game Football Hackers: The Science and Art of a Data Revolution Soccernomics Money and Soccer: A Soccernomics Guide The Numbers Game: Why Everything You Know About Soccer Is Wrong Python Friends of Tracking FC Python
